WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

I cannot get the correct date from my excel sheet.
My column is in date type and what I can see in excel is 

01/02/2013


I try all the possible combination for RangetoArray and never get this correct date :

```
RangetoArray('A1:AL2', null, false, false, false);
date : 41306

RangetoArray('A1:AL2', null, true, false, false);
date : 41306

RangetoArray('A1:AL2', null, false, true, false);
date : 02-01-13

RangetoArray('A1:AL2', null, false, false, true);
date : 41306

RangetoArray('A1:AL2', null, true, true, false);
date : 02-01-13

RangetoArray('A1:AL2', null, true, false, true);
date : 41306

RangetoArray('A1:AL2', null, false, true, true);
date : 02-01-13

RangetoArray('A1:AL2', null, true, true, true);
date : 02-01-13

```

Month and day are reversed, year is on 2 characters and not 4, separator is - instead of /



How can I get the date in the same format than the one use in excel?
THanks
Regards
